ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the Annotations API to create Text, Line, Box, LineArrow and Custom Annotations in Xaml.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
An introduction to the UIElement Annotations API, which allows WPF UIElements to be placed over the chart at specific X and Y data-values.
[b]Annotation Types Include:[/b]
- [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20AxisMarkerAnnotation%20Type.html']AxisMarkerAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20BoxAnnotation%20Type.html']BoxAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20CompositeAnnotation%20Type.html']CompositeAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20CustomAnnotation%20Type.html']CustomAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20HorizontalLineAnnotation%20Type.html']HorizontalLineAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20LineAnnotation%20Type.html']LineAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20LineArrowAnnotation%20Type.html']LineArrowAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20TextAnnotation%20Type.html']TextAnnotation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20VerticalLineAnnotation%20Type.html']VerticalLineAnnotation[/url]
